## Overview

## Setup
```{r load packages}
require(tidyverse)
require(magrittr)
require(lubridate)
require(stringr)
require(skimr)
```

```{r read data}
df_trans = read_csv("../Mint_Transactions_Data/Input/transactions_20170713.csv")
```

```{r clean up data}
df_trans %<>% 
  separate(Date, c("Month", "Day", "Year")) %>% 
  mutate(
    Date = ymd(
      paste0(Year, 
             str_pad(Month, 2, pad = 0, side = "left"), 
             str_pad(Day, 2, pad = 0, side = "left"))
    ),
    Month = as.numeric(Month),
    Day = as.numeric(Day),
    Year = as.numeric(Year)
  )

names(df_trans) = make.names(names(df_trans))
```


## Work
### Initial Look
```{r}
glimpse(df_trans)
skim(df_trans)
```

```{r check distributions}
df_trans %>% 
  filter(!(Category %in% c("Paycheck", "Credit Card Payment", "Transfer"))) %>% 
  group_by(Category) %>% 
  summarize(
    n = n(),
    Amount = sum(Amount)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    dist = Amount / sum(Amount),
    mean_amount = Amount / n
  ) %>% 
  arrange(desc(dist)) %>% 
  mutate(dist = scales::percent(dist))
```



### Photography
```{r}
df_photography = df_trans %>% 
  filter(Category == "Photography") 

df_photography %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x = Date, y = Amount)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()

df_photography %>% 
  group_by(Year, Month) %>% 
  summarize(Amount = sum(Amount)) %>% 
  mutate(
    Date = ymd(
      paste0(Year, 
             str_pad(Month, 2, pad = 0, side = "left"), 
             "01")
    )
  ) %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x = Date, y = Amount)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```
